session_summary: Jon and Gina caught up at 6:46 pm on 23 July, 2023. Jon shared his stress about rehearsals and business plans but found solace in dancing. Gina encouraged him with motivational words from Shia Labeouf, emphasizing the importance of creating a space for dancers. Jon appreciated Gina's support and looked forward to opening his dance studio. Gina continued to motivate Jon, reminding him to never give up. The conversation ended with Jon feeling motivated and ready to "just do it", as Gina encouraged him to do.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jon
conversation_turns.text: Hey Gina! We haven't talked in a few days. Been rehearsing hard and working on business plans. It's been stressful, but dancing has kept me going.

conversation_turns.speaker: Gina
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a group of dancers on a stage with their arms in the air
conversation_turns.text: Hey Jon! Remember, just do it! You should get to the point where anyone else would quit and you're not going to stop there. No, what are you waiting for? Do it! Just do it!

conversation_turns.speaker: Jon
conversation_turns.text: Ha, ha! Thanks, Gina. Sounds familiar, who do those words belong to?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jon
conversation_turns.text: Ahhahha, really!? Yea, that definitely him.

conversation_turns.speaker: Gina
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of three girls in ballet costumes sitting on a desk
conversation_turns.text: Hah, yeah!) But really having a creative space for dancers is so important. Last Friday at dance class with a group of friends I felt it. Your studio will be a go-to spot for self-expression. Keep up the good work and don't forget your passion for dance.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jon
conversation_turns.text: Thanks, Gina! Your words of encouragement keep me motivated. Can't wait 'til my studio starts welcoming dancers of all ages and backgrounds!

conversation_turns.speaker: Gina
conversation_turns.text: I'm so happy to see my words motivating you, Jon. <3

conversation_turns.speaker: Jon
conversation_turns.text: Thanks a ton, Gina! Your help and encouragement mean a lot. Your support will help me make it happen.

conversation_turns.speaker: Gina
conversation_turns.text: You're welcome, Jon! I'm here to support you. Every step's getting you closer to your dream. Never give up! You're doing great.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jon
conversation_turns.text: Thanks, Gina! I won't quit. I'm gonna keep going, whatever comes my way.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jon
conversation_turns.text: Ah ha ha, yeah, JUST DOING IT!

Gina: Gina takes a dance class with a group of friends.

Jon: Jon has been rehearsing hard and working on business plans.
Dancing has kept Jon going during stressful times.
Jon is working on opening a studio for dancers of all ages and backgrounds.
Gina: Gina encouraged Jon to keep up the good work and not forget his passion for dance.
Gina is supportive of Jon's dream of opening a dance studio.
